Embarcadero needs to be raised as much as 7 feet to prepare for sea level rise, S.F. says

Portions of the Embarcadero should be raised as much as seven feet in coming decades to prepare for rising bay waters, according to work being done by the Port of San Francisco. There’s no timetable for precisely when this is needed, or how the changes would alter a busy stretch of the waterfront.
